name: Toggle Tanks
description:
Toggle Tank was made for the Game Development Field Guide Matchmaking Game Jam. We were all teamed up by Zackavelli. 

Toggle Tank uses two control systems:

Keyboard/Mouse: WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot (left button), Esc to go to Pause Menu.

Controller (default): Left stick to move, right stick to aim, Right Trigger to shoot, Start to go to Pause Menu.

Controller (tank controls set in options): Left stick to move forward/backward, RB turn right, LB turn left, Right Trigger to shoot, Start to go to Pause Menu.

The Following Developers worked on Toggle Tanks:

Alex_Epton - Code, Visual Effects, Levels Design and Sound Design

Draekdude - Code, Controls, AI Design and Level Design

LandosLair - Code, UI Design, Levels Design and Art

Lee M - Code and Level Design

Nikkolas - Art and Animations
